website_summaries.verdict: Suction lifters offer excellent performance without slippage when used on smooth surfaces.
pros: Provides a maximum carrying load of up to 250 pounds
Uses an aluminum construction in both the handle and in the cups, which means it should last a long time
Size of 13 by 4.6 by 3.5 inches means you can grip the handle comfortably
cons: Will not work well on wood grain surfaces where there's some porosity

website_summaries.verdict: Pull dents or move awkward, bulky sheets with this double suction cup. It can lift up to 250 pounds in level and 210 in vertical.
pros: Works for pulling dents or lifting flat, non-porous surfaces
Maximum lifting capacity is 250 in level and 210 in vertical
Bar-style handle accommodates for vertical and horizontal applications
cons: Will not work on wood grain surfaces
During cold spells, the cups must be warmed to function properly

customer_reviews.title: Seems very good, but was obviously used.
customer_reviews.text: While the quality of materials, design and function all seemed good, ours was obviously used with multiple small scratches present, "naked" (i.e. no packaging or instructions). After buying it and looking at the reviews, we weren't the first to experience this. We still kept them because my father-in-law didn't mind, but still, "used" should not be sold as "new" ethically or legally.
customer_reviews.author: Ken S

customer_reviews.title: Works great for what I use it for
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I use it for. Used it to make a wake shaping device for my boat. Holds to the side of the boat like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't weld a handle; just stick one on and pull
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these to move a giant wall mirror (12' x 4') and it still took me and two friends to move the mirror. Let me tell you though: these handles never moved an inch on the mirrored surface and we were able to pull the mirror away from the wall and lower it to the ground without a care in the world. These things are great for moving large pieces of glass and other objects you can stick it to. The only downside is that the suction levers are flimsy plastic. I was kind of afraid I was going to break it when flipping them down to seal the cups.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph D'A

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for safety
customer_reviews.text: we are using them in the shower and on the side of the tub. Fantastic for safety, no matter how hard you try they cannot come off the wall until you release the suction. There is no need to put railings in shower, and they don't damage the wall or tile.
customer_reviews.author: chuck

customer_reviews.title: good for my non standard use
customer_reviews.text: I stuck this on the side of my shower to have a place to rest my foot while I shave my legs. Maybe not the standard use for this item ( ha), but works well and is of course easy to install. No drilling required. Easy to change placement too. It really sticks to the tile, you could probably build a ladder out of these. It is larger than I thought, but fine as I can rest the entire pad of my foot on the 'handle' part. Its holding up well to getting wet also..
customer_reviews.author: strong coffe lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great in shower!
customer_reviews.text: I actually got this to attach to my bathtub wall to restrain my dog while bathing him, and it works great for that purpose. It will fall of the wall eventually if left there more than a day or so, but taking it off and putting it back up is a snap. No idea how well it works for moving glass, but it's been great for my purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Sam D

customer_reviews.title: Maybe a professional glass installer who will be using this hundreds of times might be better off with something else
customer_reviews.text: This was indispensable when installing our very heavy glass shower doors (~90 pounds each). I agree with other reviewers that the handles seem fragile, but I don't think they should break unless you are very rough with them. Maybe a professional glass installer who will be using this hundreds of times might be better off with something else, but for normal people who might use it a few times ever, it is great. The fact that it was available for free 1-day ship was the main reason that I chose this one over others, but it's a good product regardless of how soon you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Satterlee

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for removing heavy sliding glass door from its track
customer_reviews.text: My wife wasn't strong enough to help me get the sliding door out. With this handle, we now have enough leverage to muscle it out. I was worried about it lasting but it seems really solid and I don't mind it at all. Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Surface must be smooth.
customer_reviews.text: Great suction, easy release, I used this tool for holding up the side door windows on my truck while changing the power window regulators. I haven’t tried yet but plan to use it for a dent puller if I can utilize just one cup. I also tested it on our laminate flooring, it lifted a large section with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for unique job.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, they're excellent. Thse (you get two) are terrific. Had to remove a large mirror from a wall (which went fantastically well; not a chip or scratch on the glass) and then move it a couple of times. The mirror was 4'x5' and weighed ~70 lbs. No probblem at all handling it. The cups are easy on, easy off; very powerful suction. The handles comfortable and sturdy. Gave a very strong grip and I felt confident moving the mirror by myself. Can't imagine anything being better at what it does.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out that I needed to spray the glass with water, I found these to be perfect. I'm using them for 2 windows in my Jeep Liberty. The regulators went out on 3 windows at the same time. This will hold them in place until I get them fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Corrina

customer_reviews.title: Holds well, leaves circles where it contacts the surface
customer_reviews.text: Leaves yellow circles on white HDPE. Better not find any circles on my boat since I'm using this to make awake shaper.
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy L.

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders on my sliding glass door as well keeps kids' finger safe from a possible injury.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and works wonders in opening and closing our back sliding glass doors. Not only it helps keep the hand prints off the glass, but it as well helps the kids keep their fingers away from the edge "closing part" where their fingers can get the door slammed on. It's also great for those heavier type of doorsor ones that simply are a bit older and needs an added force to open. Best Buy for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Superior product. Exactly that.
customer_reviews.text: This is 10 times better than my previous plastic one. The rubber suction cups are a thick sterdy rubber. The suction is also far better than my old one. I highly recommend this product for it's quality and value.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Ta

customer_reviews.title: excellent product, the grip is great.
customer_reviews.text: excellent suction ive had others before and they weren't as good. i use it when i lay tile. make sure to clean the surface of the product and the suctions from dust or other or else it will lose suction and you will end up with 32"porcelain tile on your feet. that's what happened to me.
customer_reviews.author: lalolo77

customer_reviews.title: Super grip!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to build a suck gate for my SV211. Have used it multiple times through the summer and has never came off in use. Works great for what I purchased it for
customer_reviews.author: Porkchop

customer_reviews.title: SAVED ME MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I was able to save money by not having to call someone out to fix the gaps in my laminate flooring and was able to do it myself with this gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a month
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about a month. After that, it started falling off the shower wall every time -shortly after we would hang it. Great concept and we were really enjoying it for my Mom (late stage Alzheimer's Disease) while it worked, but unfortunately, it is now sitting on our bathroom counter destined for the trashcan.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Matson

customer_reviews.title: Buy two—they work great!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible suction! Bought two of these to remove and replace a double pane window. Worked great. I also found these are great for removing our dining area glass table top which is 60" in diameter and very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for fixing floating wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Worked well. Used it on my floating wood flooring for some areas that were not glued properly. So I suctioned it onto the piece of flooring, added some glue to joint, and used rubber mallet to tap into place; then wiped away any excess glue. Key is to wipe surface clean before using, or clean the suction cups often; as suction cups don't work when dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I converted this into a removable car surface bike mount.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Tolentino

customer_reviews.title: Great Holding Power
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to install flat glass in a classic pickup truck. They performed way beyond expectations! Glass was installed without any issues and I will use these for mirror placement in our new house. For the price, these are an excellent value. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lauretta Zatarski

customer_reviews.title: I've been very satisfied with the quality and functionality of this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchase these for installing the 3/8" tempered glass panels in our frameless shower and they gripped and held the glass panels securely. We also had some gaps opening up in the ends of some of the planks in a new laminate floor and I clamped these to the planks so I could pull them back together. I've been very satisfied with the quality and functionality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Don S

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this product
customer_reviews.text: I finally got the chance to use these suction cups to replace the front windows in my house. They worked perfectly. The windows are 81 x 50 double pane and weigh more than I expected, but had no problems. The replacement took about 3 1/2 hours each window . I'm very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: I loved this so much
customer_reviews.text: I loved this so much. Unfortunately after only two weeks, the front opened and the mustard seed was lost. :(
customer_reviews.author: Christan Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great for quilt rulers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my 24" x 6" quilt ruler. It works great. The suction cups don't always stay suctioned, but I just reattach them and it works perfectly. It's the perfect size for my ruler.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing and worked perfectly. I needed something to handle 1/2" tempered glass for a shower assembly. These held the glass extremely well so it could be installed without any damage. Will definitely be ordering another one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!  Highly recommended for moving glass shower panels!
customer_reviews.text: The suction cups on these are great! We used two of them when installing our frameless shower doors and they worked perfectly. One of the glass panels was about 100 lbs. and the other was about 60 lbs.. Didn't have any issues moving the glass into place. I will be using them again when I do my other bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Great for shower-door installations
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I purchased two of these when installing glass shower doors in my bathroom. They made the job easy and professional. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: K. O'Meara

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. Very easy to suction to and remove from ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this to adjust the positioning of the rear window on my 2001 Corvette convertible when I had to re-glue it to the fabric (a known problem with this generation of Corvettes over time). Worked great. Very easy to suction to and remove from the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny5

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: I use these on the side on boats in the water so I can tie up to them for work they work great
customer_reviews.author: big ray

customer_reviews.title: I use this on my dryer after the handle broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my dryer after the handle broke. It's been on for months and hasn't lost grip even with constant shaking.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for handling glass!
customer_reviews.text: These handles worked great, and made my job and job of my contractors a lot easier! I am so satisfied, that would give this product 6 stars, if there was such option.
customer_reviews.author: M. Mostov

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a quality tool, I used it to close gaps in my Laminate Floor, worked great. A Inexpensive way to close Gaps in Flooring, just need to put a little down force on it when you hit it with a rubber mallet otherwise it will come off the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had to lift and move a very thick, large glass sheet, and it worked very well (used two double handles)! I definitely recommend buying these handle.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander M.

customer_reviews.title: ... DEVICES AND THEY WORKED FLAWLESSLY AND THE INSTALL WAS PERFECT! GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: I HAD TO INSTALL A 43"W x 40"T 1/4" VANITY MIRROR AND I BOUGHT 2 OF THESE DEVICES AND THEY WORKED FLAWLESSLY AND THE INSTALL WAS PERFECT! GREAT ITEM!
customer_reviews.author: CHGO CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: Extremely powerful holding strength for a suction cup and excellent build quality
customer_reviews.text: Was surprised just how well the suction cups hold onto smooth surfaces. Build quality is very good too.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Hendrix

customer_reviews.title: suction failed
customer_reviews.text: This was installed in a glass sliding door. It would fall often and the rubber started to peel. Bad product
customer_reviews.author: will romualdo

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality. Perfect for installing glass. I used two of these to install a new rear window on my Chevelle. They worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Used to help lay laminate flooring very good at sliding planks together awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glass Puller
customer_reviews.text: I have only used on my laminate floor to get rid of some minor end gaps. Worked 95% of the time. Held well when I pounded on it. Not perfect but really good.
customer_reviews.author: Aleck Shilaos

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pull my 9 foot paddle board when I tow it around. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: STA

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My, Mamaw needed this for her shower door it works great!
customer_reviews.author: C Stamey

customer_reviews.title: Work very well but I think the suction handles wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Work very well but I think the suction handles wear off overtime. I have a bit of trouble to stop the suction to remove them.
customer_reviews.author: S.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for using to clean my glass topped tables
customer_reviews.text: Great for using to clean my glass topped tables. Very easy to use and gives you good control of the glass tops.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: Attached it to my freezer to move it out from under a bench. Very strong grip!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: A gripping pair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used a pair to install very large picture window, worked perfectly. Window came in around 250lbs...
customer_reviews.author: petersg

customer_reviews.title: my husband made a good use of it putting our
customer_reviews.text: very strong suction device. must have for flooring job. my husband made a good use of it putting our flooring
customer_reviews.author: L.P.

customer_reviews.title: I was hopeful
customer_reviews.text: It did not pull out my dent and i had to pay 400 to a mobile dent guy. It may work great for glass though
customer_reviews.author: nonnas princess

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend for use with glass
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend for use with glass. Requires too much force to attach, does not release without being pried off glass. I had 2 pieces shatter into long sharp pieces while carrying to do installation. This item may be fine with thicker material than window glass.
customer_reviews.author: ron hickman

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: I needed a suction cup device to lift some heavy 1/2 inch granite tiles that are 18x18. I was just about to buy some $100 thing Home Depot sells and thought I would try this. Lifted the tiles without issue. Seems to have plenty of lift in reserve too and the thing appears pretty well made.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Such great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a glass sliding door for a cookie case. It was perfect Super easy to use. Nice and sturdy. Havent had any problems. It was a bit bigger than I expected but it was perfect for what I needed it for. It was easy to clean etc.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great tools.
customer_reviews.text: These suction cups are great! They work very well and get the job done with out a hastle, shipping was great my only concern is the little black actuating levers (pull the suction cups in) seem to have a little weak point that may cause them to break. Mine are still in one piece but there may be a possibility of them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Campos

customer_reviews.title: usability
customer_reviews.text: Makes carrying many cumbersome glass, polished stone and solid surface panels easier.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Temple

customer_reviews.title: The product works very good. and easily moves the planks with persuasion from ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought Pergo Max flooring and it started separating at the butt ends up to a quarter of an inch. I had read that the double cups would work well on moving the planks. The product works very good. and easily moves the planks with persuasion from a 5 lb hammer. I protect the aluminum handle by putting an old fiberglass handle on the aluminum and hit the double handle cups. Strong suction !!
customer_reviews.author: D. George

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Look awesome! Fast shipping! Unfortunately it Didn’t work as I planed on my project.
customer_reviews.author: Chris haddad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a coffee table with an extremely heavy Glass top. This product lifted it easily. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: FGF

customer_reviews.title: Great suction holders.
customer_reviews.text: Bought specifically to install customer shower glass doors. These worked awesome. Quality was incredible! I'd highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: but boy they worked great! Installed a bunch of 160# 4' x 8' ...
customer_reviews.text: These took a couple extra days to get to me... but boy they worked great! Installed a bunch of 160# 4' x 8' 3/8" glass into windows. No slippage or worry about them not holding the glass. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bob switalski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my floating floor and it worked great! Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good tool
customer_reviews.text: Used these to install 12x24" marble tiles - excellent strength - It takes a bit of muscle to clamp them down but....
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Mills

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Fixing Gaps between laminate flooring sections.
customer_reviews.text: This product rocks. We used it to fix 5 or 6 gaps that appeared between our laminate floor sections. Good quality. Great suction and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: W. Stoll

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this for anyone doing a similar job
customer_reviews.text: I used this to help adjust the window in my 2004 Mini Cooper S while doing a window regulator replacement job. The tool was not necessary for the repair, but this handle was inexpensive and well worth it. I would recommend this for anyone doing a similar job.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this very useful piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this very useful piece of equipment. Needed it to replace some defective window inserts provided by the window manufacturer. I was able to complete the task single handedly and much safer with the use of this device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but has great suction and can pull well
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I thought, but has great suction and can pull well.

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction. Easy to trust.
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction. Easy to trust, just begin with clean glass and cups.

customer_reviews.title: Great for tile!!!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product and great quality. Picks up 12x24 tiles like they are paper. A must have for any tile job!!

customer_reviews.title: SUCKgate Approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to create a SUCKgate for my boat. Works great, now we surf like champions!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works perfectly for my dining room table with glass inserts
customer_reviews.author: salvatore pugliese

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent! I have used these to install 24 x ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent! I have used these to install 24 x 24 inch porcelain tiles. I actually used two of these on each tile to be safe. They stay secure for 20 minutes. After that they begin to loose suction. I would buy these again with out a doubt!
customer_reviews.author: G. Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Great for heavy items
customer_reviews.text: This thing is made for heavy duty glass, etc. It does a great job but I was just trying to remove some Pella window inserts. I was afraid this would have broken the glass so I had to send it back. However if you have some applications of heavier items this would work great.
customer_reviews.author: Scanups

customer_reviews.title: It works great, easy to maneuver and actually holds a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's business because he works with glass aquariums and he needed them for moving them around when he does moves. It works great, easy to maneuver and actually holds a lot of weight. I was scared at first and skeptical, but we've used it numerous times and it works great!

customer_reviews.title: works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: works like a champ... lifted a 4 x 8 mirror off the wall and down a flight of stairs with just a guide following me along.

customer_reviews.text: work well installing glass rails. if we drop the glass it can be a 60 ft drop and we would break the glass. but the tool is working great

customer_reviews.text: Used it to lift my 9ft sliding door with double pane glass out of the track. Gripped the glass fine, no slipping.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect; sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a handle on a window that is difficult to open. Works perfect; sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: Much stronger than I anticipated.  Overkill for laying 18" marble tile, but, better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.text: Much stronger than I anticipated. Overkill for laying 18" marble tile, but, better safe than sorry. I had no worries about it holding a tile.

They weigh about 80 lbs each and these handles had absolutely no problem sticking and doing the job. If you have a similar project, I highly recommend these suction handles.

customer_reviews.text: It holds up some decent weight. The only issue is that the levers for the suction cups are plastic and I am always worried one is going to break under the force required to push it all the way down.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making a wake gate. :-) Has never failed me.

customer_reviews.text: This item was repurposed. It is terrific in what it is doing. If I ever need more I will come straight here.

customer_reviews.text: Had to lift a 15' x 7' piece of plate glass , and except for our backs complaining , the tool never lost suction, great tool .

product_meta.title: Cosmos Heavy Duty Aluminum Double Handle (2 cup) suction cup plate/pad for lifting/pulling glass
product_meta.description:
This is a great product to be used to stick on any smooth surface. It has two suction gripping areas with provide a strong suction to hold on to the surface you place them on .You can use this product to stick on any smooth surface and grip that item solidly. 
This high quality suction cup makes moving and lifting large glasses so easy .Great for pulling dents or lifting flat surfaces such as glass, granite counter top ,Useful to transport glass, windows, mirror and more ,It a very useful accessory . Attach this suction handle to glass, laminate, cabinets, counter tops and other smooth, clean, non-porous surfaces to position a handle where you need it. Two flip-down tabs tighten the suction cups to the surface and lock in place. 
Handle is 250 lbs / 115 KG maximum lifting capacity in level, 210 lbs / 95 KG working load capacity in Vertical. Bar-style handle is useful for vertical and horizontal applications. Caution: 
1:The produce will not work on wood grain surfaces. 
2:Always test to make sure good suction is achieved before lifting. 
3:In extreme cold, the rubber suction cups will need to be warmed to function properly.
